definition.name: tofu-remote-state
definition.description: Retrieves the root-level outputs from an OpenTofu remote state.
definition.author: Daniel Flook

inputs.name: backend_type
inputs.description: The name of the OpenTofu plugin used for backend state

inputs.name: workspace
inputs.description: OpenTofu workspace to get the outputs for

inputs.name: backend_config
inputs.description: List of OpenTofu backend config values, one per line.

inputs.name: backend_config_file
inputs.description:
List of OpenTofu backend config files to use, one per line.
Paths should be relative to the GitHub Actions workspace

outputs.name: json_output_path
outputs.description:
This is the path to all the root module outputs in a JSON file.
The path is relative to the Actions workspace.

For example, with the OpenTofu config:

```hcl
output "service_hostname" {
  value = "example.com"
}
```

The file pointed to by this output will contain:

```json
{
  "service_hostname": "example.com"
}
```

OpenTofu list, set and tuple types are cast to a JSON array, map and object types are cast to a JSON object.
